markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Plumekith](/Feats.aspx?ID=2285) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your blood soars with the power of the magnificent [garuda](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1162), proud and stoic avian warriors. You only take half the normal damage from falling and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects with the [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5) trait.

<title level="2">Plumekith leads to...</title>
[Garuda Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2291), [Garuda's Squall](/Feats.aspx?ID=2286)
name: Plumekith
